abstract: Vodafone committed itself on Wednesday to holding on to its full 45 percent stake in Verizon Wireless, the mobile phone group in the United States, turning down the right to sell back up to $10 billion of shares to its partner in the venture, Verizon Communications.
lead_paragraph: Vodafone committed itself on Wednesday to holding on to its full 45 percent stake in Verizon Wireless, the mobile phone group in the United States, turning down the right to sell back up to $10 billion of shares to its partner in the venture, Verizon Communications.

headline.main: Vodafone to Keep Stake in Verizon Wireless
